entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Nakusp
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:03 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nakusp 6:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: 1.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 94 %
Dewpoint: 0.7°C
Wind: ESE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow level 1000 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries over southern sections. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. 40 percent chance of flurries over southern sections early in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
